UsageSummary.name: UsageSummary
UsageSummary.description: Represents the aggregation of the entries in the transaction journal for a usage entitlement for a specified period.

AccountId.description: The account that's associated with the sellable product that was purchased.

AssetId.description: The asset that's associated with the entitlement that was summarized.

ConsumptionUnits.description: The quantity that was used by the usage entitlement bucket.

DebitedUnits.description: The units that are debited from the associated usage entitlement bucket.

EndDateTime.description: The end date and time of the usage summary.

GrantBindingTargetId.description: The record that's associated with the usage summary. Available in API version 64.0 and later.

LastReferencedDate.description: The date when this record was last referenced.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

LiableSummaryId.description: The usage billing period item that's associated with this usage summary.

Name.description: Autogenerated identifier for the usage summary record.

OverageUnits.description: The quantity that was overused by the usage entitlement bucket.

OwnerId.description: The ID of the owner of the usage summary.

ParentUsageSummaryId.description: The parent usage summary thatâ€™s associated with this usage summary. This field is available in API version 65.0 and later.

RatableSummaryId.description: The ratable summary that's associated with this usage summary.

StartDateTime.description: The start date and time of the usage summary.

Status.description: The status of the usage summary.

UomId.description: The unit of measure for the usage resource. This value overrides the default unit of measure defined in the associated unit of measure class.

UsageEntitlementAccountId.description: The usage entitlement account that's associated with the usage summary.

UsageEntitlementBucketId.description: The usage entitlement bucket that's associated with the usage summary.

UsageResourceId.description: The usage resource that's associated with the source of the usage entitlement bucket.
